definition: constituting or afflicted with or caused by tuberculosis or the tubercle bacillus, a person with pulmonary tuberculosis
details:
adjective
- constituting or afflicted with or caused by tuberculosis or the tubercle bacillus
= example: constituting or afflicted with or caused by tuberculosis or the tubercle bacillus
= synonyms: tuberculous
- relating to tuberculosis or those suffering from it
= example: relating to tuberculosis or those suffering from it
- pertaining to or of the nature of a normal tuberosity or tubercle
= example: pertaining to or of the nature of a normal tuberosity or tubercle
- characterized by the presence of tuberculosis lesions or tubercles
= example: characterized by the presence of tuberculosis lesions or tubercles
noun
- a person with pulmonary tuberculosis
= synonyms: consumptive
